about.title: What is Jinguo Future
about.intro: Jinguo Future (Beijing) Technology Co., Ltd. is a fintech enterprise focusing on overseas markets, dedicated to providing convenient, safe, and user-friendly inclusive financial services to users in developing countries worldwide through leading big data, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence technologies.
about.history: Since its establishment in 2020, Jinguo Future has continuously expanded its global business, rapidly achieving a leading position in multiple markets:

milestones.2021: In 2021, we entered Mexico and ranked among the top three in the industry;
milestones.2022: In 2022, we entered Colombia, where our app business captured half of the market; in the same year, we launched our Peru project, consistently ranking in the top five;
milestones.2023: In 2023, our Pakistan market officially launched and quickly rose to first place; at the end of the year, we entered Chile and continue to grow;
milestones.2025: In 2025, our business expanded to Indonesia, entering the top five in the industry; in September of the same year, we launched in the Kenyan market;
milestones.future: We will also expand into more countries and regions such as Thailand, Egypt, India, and Ecuador.

about.compliance: We highly value compliance and brand building. We have comprehensive qualifications in Latin America and Southeast Asia and are recognized as a benchmark for compliance in the region.
about.team: Jinguo Future has branches in Beijing, Chengdu, Hong Kong, and 8 overseas countries, with a team size of 3,000 people. We cherish talent and continuously create an international development platform and diverse promotion channels for our employees. Outstanding talents also have the opportunity to exchange and work in Latin America, Southeast Asia, and other regions.
about.closing: We continue to expand our global business footprint at a rate of one new market per year. If you are eager to participate in technological innovation and embrace global opportunities, welcome to join Jinguo Future and grow with us to create the future!

technology.title: Using AI to Bring Precise Change to the World
technology.titlePart1: Using AI to bring precise change
technology.subtitle: Smart risk control and digital solutions
technology.description: Our technology is quietly driving change:
technology.intro1: We are Jinguo Future, a global AI fintech company born in Beijing. With big data and AI technology, we provide smart risk control and digital solutions for emerging markets in Latin America, Southeast Asia, and Africa.
technology.intro2: Based in Beijing and Chengdu, with a presence in 7 major capitals worldwide. We are both 'tech visionaries' and 'financial pragmatists,' continuously bringing smart, inclusive services to every corner of the world.
technology.cta: Jinguo Future, waiting for you to join >

impact.description: Using algorithms, we have provided millions of users with their first reliable digital credit service, making 'unserviceable' a thing of the past.
impact.growthDesc: Our intelligent system has become a 'pioneering tool' for our partners to enter new global markets, doubling their operational efficiency and risk control capabilities.
impact.partnerDesc: We adhere to a 'global vision, local precision' philosophy. We delve deep into markets like Mexico, Jakarta, and Islamabad, strictly adhering to local compliance to build long-term trust in the global market.

homepage.saasTitle: Global SaaS Platform, Opening a New Chapter of Efficient Operations
homepage.saasDescription: The Jinguo Future Cloud Platform supports multiple languages and full-process business management, making your financial business more controllable, efficient, and precise in the global market.
homepage.saasIntegrationDesc: Integrates multi-dimensional tools such as data analysis, smart outreach, and third-party risk control. Empowered by big data and AI, it achieves integrated management of marketing, customer relations, and performance, effectively reducing risks and comprehensively improving operational efficiency.
homepage.adsTitle: Precise Advertising to Connect with Global Users
homepage.adsDescription: Covering mainstream media resources worldwide, combined with third-party tracking and anti-fraud tools, we provide high-conversion, precisely targeted global advertising services for your products.
homepage.adsTargetingDesc: Supports multi-dimensional targeting including country, device, browser, time, and interests to accurately filter audiences, effectively increasing ROI and making every penny of your budget count.
homepage.adsCreativeDesc: From ad creative planning and material production to DSP channel delivery, we provide performance marketing solutions like CPI, CPA, and CPS to help your product quickly expand into the global market.
homepage.riskTitle: Intelligent Risk Control to Safeguard Your Business
homepage.riskDescription: Integrates a multi-dimensional data risk control system to provide real-time risk assessment and warning services, helping enterprises effectively identify fraudulent behavior and build a secure and trustworthy business environment.
homepage.riskMonitoringDesc: Combines multi-dimensional data such as device fingerprinting, behavioral analysis, and credit assessment to identify abnormal transactions and fraud risks in real-time, providing intelligent risk warnings and decision support.
homepage.riskDecisionDesc: Integrates multi-source data from third-party credit bureaus, blacklists, etc., and continuously optimizes risk control strategies through machine learning models to provide a solid guarantee for business growth.

saas.title: SaaS Platform Service
saas.description: The Jinguo SaaS Cloud Platform is a multi-language, full-process software system that facilitates financial business for risk control enterprises. By integrating various intelligent tools, data, SMS outreach, voice calls, and third-party risk control, it makes business operations controllable, efficient, convenient, and precise. The system combines marketing management, customer management, and employee performance management, using big data analysis to connect with AI, reduce customer risk, and improve management levels.

innovation.title: Multi-language, Full-Process Business Support
innovation.description: Provides a multi-language, full-process system to help risk control enterprises conduct financial business, achieving controllable and efficient operations.

tool.title: Multi-dimensional Intelligent Tool Integration
tool.description: Integrates data, SMS, voice calls, and third-party risk control to promote convenient and precise business operations.

management.title: Integrated Management of Marketing, Customers, and Performance
management.description: Combines marketing, customer, and employee performance management, relying on big data to optimize operations.

ai.title: Big Data AI Empowered Risk Control Enhancement
ai.description: Connects with AI through big data analysis to reduce customer risk and improve enterprise management levels.

ads.title: Media Channel Advertising Service
ads.description: We can deliver our clients' ads to multiple countries and regions worldwide, covering mainstream app and website media resources. Combined with third-party tracking statistics and anti-fraud traffic tools, we help clients quickly promote their products or services globally, providing high-conversion and precise media advertising services.

keyword.title: Keyword Targeting
keyword.description: Deliver ads based on keywords; ads will only be displayed on media relevant to those keywords.

country.title: Country Targeting
country.description: Target specific countries and regions to precisely filter the audience, thereby increasing return on investment.

device.title: Device Targeting
device.description: Deliver ads to various devices, including Android / iOS / PC / Smart TV.

browser.title: Browser Targeting
browser.description: Push ads to specific users by creating visitor inclusion and exclusion lists.

time.title: Time Scheduling
time.description: Choose specific time slots for ad delivery, specifying certain times of the day or certain days of the week.

fun.title: Interest Targeting
fun.description: Show ads only to users who are interested in the product or service.

riskControl.title: Intelligent Risk Control Data Service
riskControl.description: Based on our mastery of risk control business and research in big data technology, we have developed a comprehensive intelligent risk control data service system. This system includes a lightweight and extensible risk control model to address scenarios like anti-fraud and anti-money laundering, effectively meeting risk control needs under various business growth situations. The data service includes integration of internal and external data, processing of risk indicators, risk control strategy services, and risk monitoring. On the tool side, it supports the integration of commercial tools and the development of proprietary tools.

innovation.title: Continuously Enriching and Innovating Solutions
innovation.description: We constantly improve model scenarios and label libraries according to market developments to maintain the innovation and advancement of our data services.

consulting.title: Integrated Consulting and Implementation Services
consulting.description: With a professional consulting team, feasible implementation plans, and mature products, we provide professional, integrated consulting and implementation services.

platform.title: Applicable to Various Base Platforms
platform.description: Suitable for various base platforms, such as traditional MPP platforms, Hadoop platforms, cloud platforms, etc.

management.title: Full-Process Closed-Loop Risk Control Management
management.description: Provides full-process risk control data services covering the entire lifecycle of the client's product.

section1.title: Hey, dare to join us and level-up the world of fintech?
section1.description: Jinguo Future, a rapidly expanding global 'Tech + Finance' giant, is recruiting the strongest teammates.

section2.title: An Unconventional Approach to Building a Global Tech-Finance Battlefield
section2.description: AI is reshaping risk control, and we need you to join the team.
section2.content: This isn't a traditional financial company, nor is it an old-school tech firm. We are Jinguo Future, a combination of 'tech vision' and 'financial pragmatism'! We deconstruct finance with code, reshape risk control with AI, and master the global market. We have established dual-engine headquarters in Beijing and Chengdu, and have lit up the map in 7 major global markets including Mexico City, Jakarta, and Islamabad.
section2.contentFooter: Over 3,000 top teammates have already assembled globally. What's next? We're just missing you!

section3.title: The Experience Here is Max-Level
section3.description: Team up to unlock new levels in global tech-finance.
section3.part1Description: Your code, strategies, and products will be deployed directly on the front lines of emerging markets like Mexico, Pakistan, and Kenya. You're not just working; you're providing unprecedented financial services to millions of users. The sense of accomplishment is top-tier!
section3.part2Description: Our business doubles annually, with new markets added every year. This means your growth must keep pace with our expansion! Here, there's no ceiling, only challenges and opportunities beyond your imagination.
section3.part3Description: Worried about outdated technology? Not here! Big data, cloud computing, and large AI models are our standard equipment. Here, you can freely use top resources to turn your brilliant ideas into reality.
section3.part4Description: We care about your ideas, not your title. Whether in our Beijing, Chengdu, or Mexico City offices, we advocate a direct, open, and collaborative atmosphere. Your voice is important.

contact.title: You bring the talent, we'll provide the stage.
contact.description: Jinguo Future is waiting for you!
